items.content_html: A lightweight static file server built with Node.js, using core modules (http, fs, and path). This project demonstrates how to serve HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and image files efficiently while handling errors and MIME types. Ideal for learning the basics of HTTP servers and file handling in Node.js.
items.title: B3Codes/custom-node-server: A lightweight static file server built with Node.js, using core modules (http, fs, and path). This project demonstrates how to serve HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and image files efficiently while handling errors and MIME types. Ideal for learning the basics of HTTP servers and file handling in Node.js.
